summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to housing for low-income households, adopting the 2005-2006 Administrative and Financial Plan for 2002 Housing Levy Programs; amending the Affordable Housing Financing Plan adopted by Ordinance 120823; adopting certain policies for use of funds from the 1986 Housing Levy and 1995 Housing Levy; and ratifying and confirming prior acts.
note: Homebuyer Program Requirements, HomeWise Program Requirements
